text: San Diego State University, or SDSU for short, is a public university in San Diego, California, and a part of the California State University system. The university has about 38,000 students. It was founded in 1897. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Aztecs. They have 17 varsity teams, most of which compete in the Mountain West Conference (MW). Three teams have separate conference memberships in sports that the MW does not sponsor. The women's lacrosse team is a member of the Big 12 Conference, the men's soccer team plays in the Western Athletic Conference, and the women's water polo team plays in the Golden Coast Conference. ==Other websites== *San Diego State University's Official website *San Diego State Aztecs' Official athletics website Category:Mountain West Conference Category:California State University Category:San Diego Category:1897 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in California
title: San Diego State University
